src:
Zidane: Saya Tahu Mbappe Ingin ke Real Madrid
05 Nov 2019, 23:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid kerap diberitakan tertarik untuk memboyong Kylian Mbappe ke Santiago Bernabeu suatu hari nanti. Sang pelatih, Zinedine Zidane, bahkan yakin pemain muda tersebut akan langsung menerima jika tawaran dari klubnya datang.
Mbappe terlihat masih nyaman bermain untuk PSG pada musim ini, dan terlihat jelas dalam 10 pertandingan yang ia lakoni di semua kompetisi. Pemain berumur 20 tahun tersebut telah menciptakan sembilan gol dan empat assist sejauh ini.
Meskipun demikian, ia tidak menutup peluang untuk hengkang ke klub lain suatu hari nanti. Sebelum penutupan musim lalu, ia pernah berujar bahwa dirinya membuka diri terhadap 'proyek baru' yang mampir ke hadapannya.
Mantan presiden Monaco yang merupakan bekas klub Mbappe, Vadim Vasilyev, pernah menyatakan tidak sepakat jika peraih medali juara Piala Dunia 2018 itu bergabung dengan Real Madrid dalam waktu dekat. Ia merasa bahwa kepindahan tersebut masih terlalju dini.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Zidane: I Know Mbappe wants to go to Real Madrid
05 Nov 2019, 23:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Real Madrid is often reportedly interested in bringing Kylian Mbappe to the Santiago Bernabeu one day. The coach, Zinedine Zidane, even believes the young player will immediately accept if an offer from his club comes.
Mbappe looks still comfortable playing for PSG this season, and is clearly visible in the 10 matches he played in all competitions. The 20-year-old has created nine goals and four assists so far.
Even so, he did not close the opportunity to move to another club one day. Before the close of last season, he had said that he opened himself to the 'new project' that stopped in front of him.
Former Monaco president who is a former Mbappe club, Vadim Vasilyev, has stated he disagrees if the 2018 World Cup winner medalist joins Real Madrid in the near future. He felt that the move was too early.

Scroll down to read full information.
